option.name: content
option.value:
You are a senior software engineer.
Generate a Conventional Commit message using ONLY the provided changes.
STRICT RULES: - Format: type(scope): short summary - Allowed types: feat, fix, refactor, perf, test, docs, style, chore - Use imperative mood (e.g. "fix bug", not "fixed bug") - Title max 72 characters - Add a blank line after the title - Add a concise body explaining WHAT changed and WHY - Do NOT describe every file - Do NOT invent information - Do NOT add explanations outside the commit message - If no real change is detected, output: chore: update code
Only output the commit message.

option.name: content
option.value:
You are a senior code reviewer.
Review ONLY the provided changes.
Focus on: - Bugs - Edge cases - Performance issues - Security concerns - Code clarity - Bad practices
Be concise and actionable. Do not rewrite the entire code. Do not invent context not present in the diff.
Changes: {{diff}}

list.name: Changes
list.comment: chore(docker-compose.yml): update Docker image registry and change exposed port

task.summary: Default task
Initialize project with essential setup files including `.gitignore`, `.dockerignore`, `.gitattributes`, `.rubocop.yml`, `.ruby-version`, `.rspec`, as well as default error pages in `public/`.
Add models, controllers, and views for household and financial profile management
Add comprehensive test suite for core models, services, and factories
Initialize database schema and migrations for core models including households, properties, offers, simulations, and related associations.
Adjust workspace configuration and add Pagy initializer
Implement responsive and localized authentication views with Tailwind CSS, including registration, login, password management, and profile editing.
Implement responsive and localized authentication views with Tailwind CSS, including registration, login, password management, and profile editing.
Add property import feature with URL scraping, including controller action, service, and frontend updates.

Enhance property scraping: parse structured info from titles, including city, price, surface, rooms, and bedrooms; add generic extractors for bedrooms, postal codes, and property types. Update test page documentation.
Add caching and image extraction to property scraping, introduce geocoding, and enable JavaScript rendering.
Make postal codes optional
Add migration to separate loan payments and monthly charges in financial profiles, update workspace configuration and include documentation on HCSF rules.
Add migration to separate loan payments and monthly charges in financial profiles, update workspace configuration and include documentation on HCSF rules.
Include warning messages and Jinka-specific error handling in property scraper and importer; update frontend to display warnings and provide Jinka troubleshooting steps.
Add migration and updates to handle image URLs in properties; extend scraper, backend, and frontend integration.
Parse structured information from property titles to improve data extraction accuracy; enhance scraper with title-based price, surface, rooms, bedrooms, and city fallback logic.
Refactor property scraper: modularize URL data extraction, add stricter validations, improve Jinka and agency-specific handling, and enhance error logging.
Add estimated notary fees calculation and display to property details page.
Update UI for consistency and responsive behavior across forms, lists, and navigation components.
Trigger property image downloads after update and improve comparison validation logic.
Add rake task to enqueue property image downloads and processing in background
Update `.gitignore` to include feature documents and CLAUDE.md, adjust workspace configuration, and increment local task counters
Add negotiation simulator and update offers controller to handle loan calculations
Add `PropertyPriceHistory` model, migration, and UI updates for price tracking and percentage drop detection

**feat(.idea/workspace.xml): add `PropertyPriceHistory` model, migration, and UI updates for price tracking**
- [ADD] Added the `PropertyPriceHistory` model. - [ADD] Created the corresponding migration to update the database schema. - [REFACTOR] Refactored the UI to display price history and percentage drop detection features.
**feat(.idea/workspace.xml): add negotiation simulator and update offers controller to handle loan calculations**
- [ADD] Added a negotiation simulator feature to offers controller. - [FIX] Updated `offers_controller` to handle loan calculations.
**fix(README.md): update `.gitignore` to include feature documents and CLAUDE.md, adjust workspace configuration, and increment local task counters**
- [REFACTOR] Adjusted the `.gitignore` file to include feature documents and CLAUDE.md. - [REFACOTR] Updated workspace configuration to ensure proper project setup. - [CHORE] Incremented the local task counter from 23 to 25.
**refactor(rake_task.rb): add rake task to enqueue property image downloads and processing in background**
- [REFACTOR] Modularized URL data extraction in the scraper. - [REFACTOR] Added stricter validations for property URLs. - [REFACTOR] Enhanced Jinka and agency-specific handling in the scraper. - [REFACOTR] Improved error logging in the scraper.
**fix(offers_controller.rb): trigger property image downloads after update and improve comparison validation logic**
- [FIX] Triggered property image downloads after updates to ensure visual consistency. - [REFACTOR] Updated comparison validation logic to handle various edge cases more effectively.
**feat(ui/styles.css): add estimated notary fees calculation and display to property details page**
- [ADD] Added CSS styles for displaying estimated notary fees on the property details page.
**refactor(property_scraper.rb): parse structured information from property titles to improve data extraction accuracy**
- [REFACOTR] Enhanced scraper with title-based price, surface, rooms, bedrooms, and city fallback logic. - [REFACTOR] Improved Jinka and agency-specific handling in the scraper.
**refactor(db/migrate/20190831154516_create_property_price_history.rb): handle image URLs in properties**
- [REFACTOR] Extended scraper, backend, and frontend integration to manage image URLs efficiently. - [REFACOTR] Updated migration to accommodate new data requirements for property images.

- [ADD] Added CSS styles for displaying estimated notary fees on the property details page.

- [REFACOTR] Enhanced scraper with title-based price, surface, rooms, bedrooms, and city fallback logic. - [REFACTOR] Improved Jinka and agency-specific handling in the scraper.
